Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel if you are looking for sightseeing!”
Reviews.Author: Vernon N
Reviews.Content: If you are interested in discovering Istanbul rather than staying in a hotel to rest, then it is a very good choice for you. If you are however looking forward for staying at the hotel, swimming, eating and massaging or whatsoever then you are in the wrong place. Hotel Lamartine is a 4* hotel. Positive: Excellent location (that is 5 min walk to Istiklal street, the best and by far the most interesting street in Istanbul), good varieties in the breakfast buffet and for every taste, rooms are new and clean, not big but not small. Views are on the street if you are on the right hand side and views on the roofs of Istanbul houses if your room is on your left. Staff is friendly a little bit strict but not more. (we got our check in at 9:00 in the morning, what a surprise!! we did not wait till 14:00). The booking price is excellent for what you are getting (less than 50Euro/night) Negative Not suitable at all for people who are coming as I previously explained to spend much of their day in the hotel because there is nothing to do there but to sleep and eat your breackfast. There is no piscine or rooftop dining hall. The lobby was not of my taste. Some did like it but I did not and I avoided as much as I can for spending some time there. All in all, very good hotel quality and service for specific people.

Reviews.Title: “Good location”
Reviews.Author: Small_BuG_123
Reviews.Content: 1. The room size is ok 2. Room condition is soso 3. Location is good (but this area with tons of hotel) near to metro and the taksim & shopping street 4. Serivce is good 5. Internet is good

Reviews.Title: “Good but small rooms.......”
Reviews.Author: ronjiv
Reviews.Content: We had a pleasant stay for 3 nights, the staff were very cordial and spoke reasonably good English! The breakfast spread was very good. The hotel is not very close to the old city where all the historical monuments are situated.However, it is in the heart of the Taskim Square. The rooms are however, quite small and a bit cramped. Please note that there is no provision for making your cup of tea/coffee early in the morning, but you can request for hot water in your room.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel at a very convenient location with helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: Borntraveller55
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this Hotel for 4 nights in two stints in Istanbul. Staff and Service is more personalised and seems better than a 5 star. You feel homely. Very centrally located. The Hotel is next to Taksim square - Main bus terminus, Funicular and Metro station are just close by. Shops to buy water and all other daily requirement are next door. At the end of the lane is the Exchange Counter which Offers very good rate. Staff is very helpful and attentive, They guided us well for all our personal trips to various places around Istanbul. Hotel was neat and clean. Breakfast was a large spread and there were enough items for vegetarians too. Rooms are small and compact but clean. Only small negative we found was that aircon was not very effective.

Reviews.Title: “just what we needed”
Reviews.Author: kria
Reviews.Content: Lamartine is very close to the Havas bus stop on Taksim. I looks recently renovated and displays a modern minimalist design with a good colour scheme. My room was big enough, the bathroom was comfortable and all appliances worked as expected. The staff was fluent in English and professional. The breakfast was really rich - continental, Turkish and English food and a really good selection of local cheeses, 6 kinds of them. Standing in a narrow street it has no views. Small restaurants have tables right on the street in front of it and there was live music too. My room was on the 7th floor on the other side so I could see a lot of red rooftops and did suffer aany noise. Afraid it can be rather dark closer to the street. To put it short - it was a good bed, bath and breakfast in and superb location. All we needed

Reviews.Title: “Good location bad service”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this hotel for 4 nights. The first night the ac didn't work and the reception said it was because someone switched off during the night. Second night same problem and reception said they would clean the filter, third night same and reception said now it was the better it could get! Unbelievable! We were in the top floor and it was clear that the ac wasnt enough in that floor! One night we even slept with the windows open hearing all the noise from outside! I don't recommend at all! There are many other hotels in this area with the same price and it cannot be worse than this!

Reviews.Title: “Better than expected!”
Reviews.Author: Alekor89
Reviews.Content: When we arrived at lamartine hotel we were pleased.Excellent facilities,very clean rooms.The most important is that it is located in the heart of Istanbul,Taxim square and someone can easily have access to the restaurants,caffes,bars and clubs there.The stuff is very friendly and give you the information needed to get allong with this non-spoken-english city.Great hotel.Pleasant stay.Wonderful city.I definately recomend it.

Reviews.Title: “Bad Experience”
Reviews.Author: concorde007
Reviews.Content: Lamartine is an average 4 star hotel and expensive. I stayed there May-08 for a week and found the experience not-satisfactory. I donâ€™t expect extreme luxury with a 4 star hotel, but at least some basic requirement of cordial staff. Staff there seems to be so displeased with their work and they do not show any interest on their customers. For example, there was a problem with the blinking light in my closet which I identified and reported on the first day itself. Till the last day I left it was not rectified. Another instance where there was no bottle opener in the mini bar and when I requested for it, the staff asked me to open the beer bottled with my teeth. What do u expect from such a place like this?? The only advantage is the hotel is in the heart of the city and itâ€™s a safe place to stay. Like no hanky panky stuff.

Reviews.Title: “Great Service-Hotel in the heart of the CITY! Compact but neat : )”
Reviews.Author: PraveenSuravanditha
Reviews.Content: This hotel is in the heart of the Commercial city Taxim Square- The hotel rooms is compact and bang on the street. Yet the hotel is very neat and presentable and its service is commendable! Just a J walk is the Square. For Indians the Indian food is just a street away. Musafir is the name of the Indian restaurant sure has fantastic spread and a street away. You are surrounded by banks and eateries. Yes a cool place to stay-They also have broadband connectivity for convenience. It was a memorable trip. Caution: I was on a non peak season and still the hotel runs full. The check in is 12noon only. So check with your flight schedule and map it to the check in time. If it does not match check with the hotel before you land, Whether they could accommodate you early? This is just to avoid any disappointment. Even in the waiting time they took good care. Explore, Experience, Enjoy Suravanditha Praveen Kumar

HotelInfo.Name: Lamartine Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Lamartine Caddesi 25, Istanbul 34437, Turkey
